page.title: 17Childs-Play in Uxbridge
page.content: Children play many games on their own based on traditional play or television programmes.They usually play at home with siblings or friends or at local parks such as Rockingham Rec or Fassnidge.There are also clubs and activities such as Brownies, Boys Brigade,dancing or horse-riding. Below are comments from local seven year children. ,, When I get home we watch T.V and afterwards we go out to the garden and we play cops and robbers,,. ,, I go horse-riding and I ride Beauty,,. ,, I go to Brownies on Wednesday.I make things,,. ,, I play with my mum,nan or by myself.
